products.title: Radiant FR Royal
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Radiant FR Royal Flame Retardant Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Flame Retardant Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:

 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
